original: kun nas 'dzag pa'i mchi mas mig ni bkag byas pa //
analyzed: kun nas 'dzag pa'i mchi mas mig ni bkag byas pa //
translated: and my eyes are blocked by the tears that flow.🔽You, woman, have taken away my wife,

original: bud med khyod kyi srog dang mnyam pa des bdag gi //
analyzed: bud med khyod kyi srog dang mnyam pa des bdag gi //
translated: who is dearer to me than my life,

original: mdza' mo phrogs te nyi mar ldan pas mtshan mo ltar //
analyzed: mdza' mo phrogs te nyi mar ldan pas mtshan mo ltar //
translated: like the night, which is taken away by the sun, which is joined to it.

original: bdag ni de dang bral bas brtan pa rnyed 'gyur min //
analyzed: bdag ni de dang bral bas brtan pa rnyed 'gyur min //
translated: I will not find stability without her,

original: rtag tu rjes 'brel glang chen gyi sa ni glang mo ltar //
analyzed: rtag tu rjes 'brel glang chen gyi sa ni glang mo ltar //
translated: like an elephant without his mate, who is always with him.

original: bdag dang bral bas des @152b kyang brtan pa thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag dang bral bas des @152b kyang brtan pa thob mi 'gyur //
translated: But since I am not my own, I cannot attain stability through it.

original: ri dags mo ni nus med ri dags dang bral ltar //
analyzed: ri dags mo ni nus med ri dags dang bral ltar //
translated: Just as a powerless doe is separated from the deer,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don cing bud med de gos kyis mgrin par bcings te gus par byed cing smras pa /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don cing bud med de gos kyis mgrin par bcings te gus par byed cing smras pa /
translated: In this way, the Bodhisattva, lamenting, tied the woman's throat with a cloth, and respectfully said:

original: de bas tha snyad phyir shod cig / rgyal bar nges par bdag cag 'gro //
analyzed: de bas tha snyad phyir shod cig / rgyal bar nges par bdag cag 'gro //
translated: Therefore, speak for the sake of convention. We will certainly go to the Victorious One.

original: yang na bdag gi mo 'ongs shig / bdag nyid ngan pa des phrogs pa //
analyzed: yang na bdag gi mo 'ongs shig / bdag nyid ngan pa des phrogs pa //
translated: Or, let my wife come. I have been carried off by that evil one.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'gugs par gyur pa de 'jigs pas yid skyo nas smras pa //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'gugs par gyur pa de 'jigs pas yid skyo nas smras pa //
translated: In this way, the Bodhisattva summoned her. She, frightened and distressed, said:

original: da ni bdag gi chung ma de yod par ci'i phyir nus te 'phags pas bka' drin mdzod cig dang / bdag gi srir mo'i bu mo yod ;
analyzed: da ni bdag gi chung ma de yod par ci'i phyir nus te 'phags pas bka' drin mdzod cig dang / bdag gi srir mo'i bu mo yod ;
translated: Now, how can I have that wife? Please be kind, Noble One, and give me your daughter, who is my wife.

original: / cung zad nu ma mngon 'byung ba //
analyzed: / cung zad nu ma mngon 'byung ba //
translated: She has a little breast that is just beginning to show.

original: slob ma bzang la sngags bzhin du //
analyzed: slob ma bzang la sngags bzhin du //
translated: Like a good student to a mantra,

original: bdag gis khyed la de sbyin gyi //
analyzed: bdag gis khyed la de sbyin gyi //
translated: I will give her to you.

original: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
translated: The Bodhisattva said:

original: bdag la lha'i bu mo gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag la lha'i bu mo gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: “I have no need for any other celestial maiden.

original: mchog gi gdong can chung ma de khrid la shog ces smras so //
analyzed: mchog gi gdong can chung ma de khrid la shog ces smras so //
translated: Bring me that wife of yours with the beautiful face.”

original: gal te khyod kyi de mo'o //
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi de mo'o //
translated: “If she is yours,

original: bdag gi bud med g-yon lta'i mig / rdo ba chen po 'di yis ni //
analyzed: bdag gi bud med g-yon lta'i mig / rdo ba chen po 'di yis ni //
translated: then with this great stone

original: khyod kyi mgo bo phye mar bya //
analyzed: khyod kyi mgo bo phye mar bya //
translated: I will crush your head to bits.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo ba blangs nas bud med de la kun nas brdung bar 'dod pa bzhin du khro gnyer gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo ba blangs nas bud med de la kun nas brdung bar 'dod pa bzhin du khro gnyer gsal bar byas so //
translated: Then the Bodhisattva, as if he wanted to take the stone and beat the woman, frowned angrily.

original: de nas bud med de 'jigs bas 'phags pa bka' drin mdzod cig dang / bdag ni phongs pa dang gnyen 'dun med pa rnam par 'jigs par 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nas bud med de 'jigs bas 'phags pa bka' drin mdzod cig dang / bdag ni phongs pa dang gnyen 'dun med pa rnam par 'jigs par 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: Then the woman, frightened, said, “Noble one, be kind! I am not in distress, nor am I without relatives. I am not someone to be feared.

original: nongs pa byas kyang bud med skye bo ni //
analyzed: nongs pa byas kyang bud med skye bo ni //
translated: Even if I have done wrong,🔽a woman is by nature distressed.

original: rang bzhin gyis phongs skye bzangs rtse bar byed //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis phongs skye bzangs rtse bar byed //
translated: A good man plays with her.

original: de ltar khros pa 'di ni bsdus mdzod cig / blo gros brtan pa bdag ni gsad bya min //
analyzed: de ltar khros pa 'di ni bsdus mdzod cig / blo gros brtan pa bdag ni gsad bya min //
translated: So, wise one, be kind to this angry woman. I am not to be killed.”

original: de ltar smras nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa dag la gtugs par gyur to //
analyzed: de ltar smras nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa dag la gtugs par gyur to //
translated: Having said this, he fell at the feet of the Bodhisattva.

original: de nas bdag nyid chen po des 'jigs pa de shes nas smras pa /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid chen po des 'jigs pa de shes nas smras pa /
translated: Then the Great Being, understanding his fear, said:

original: gal te khyod kho bo cag gi tshig byed par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kho bo cag gi tshig byed par gyur na /
translated: “If you will do as I say,

original: de bas na bdag gi rdo ba 'di khyod kyi mgo bo la phog par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bdag gi rdo ba 'di khyod kyi mgo bo la phog par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: then this stone of mine will not fall on your head.”

original: des smras pa /
analyzed: des smras pa /
translated: He said:

original: khyod kyi bka' ni bdag gis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te 'phags pas smra bar 'os so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: khyod kyi bka' ni bdag gis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te 'phags pas smra bar 'os so zhes zer ro //
translated: “I will not transgress your word, Noble One, it is fitting for you to speak.”

original: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
translated: The Bodhisattva said:

original: gal te khyod ni 'da' bar mi byed na bde ba dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽de bas na nyon cig dang / khyod kyis khyo po shi ba yi //
analyzed: gal te khyod ni 'da' bar mi byed na bde ba dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro // de bas na nyon cig dang / khyod kyis khyo po shi ba yi //
translated: “If you will not transgress, then you will be happy.

original: @153a * // lus po de ni phrag par khyer //
analyzed: @153a * // lus po de ni phrag par khyer //
translated: So listen, and you will carry on your shoulder the corpse of your husband.

original: de ltar rmongs pa rnams shes na //
analyzed: de ltar rmongs pa rnams shes na //
translated: In this way, having understood the delusion,

original: mun pa bzhin du dor bar gyis //
analyzed: mun pa bzhin du dor bar gyis //
translated: you will cast it off as if it were darkness.

original: yang dang yang du 'gro 'gro zhing //
analyzed: yang dang yang du 'gro 'gro zhing //
translated: Again and again you will go

original: yang dang yang du steng du 'byung //
analyzed: yang dang yang du steng du 'byung //
translated: And again and again, it rises up.

original: skye dgu'i bdag po lag thob pa //
analyzed: skye dgu'i bdag po lag thob pa //
translated: The lord of beings, with his hand,

original: skye 'di pho long bzhin du byed //
analyzed: skye 'di pho long bzhin du byed //
translated: Makes this birth like a ball of dough.

original: nan gyis dus min gsod par byed pa su yi 'di //
analyzed: nan gyis dus min gsod par byed pa su yi 'di //
translated: Who is this one who forcefully kills at the wrong time?

original: mi rtag pa nyid gzugs ni mnan nas 'byung ba min //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid gzugs ni mnan nas 'byung ba min //
translated: The form of impermanence is not suppressed and arises.

original: rab tu drag pa'i shugs dang ldan pa rlung gis ni //
analyzed: rab tu drag pa'i shugs dang ldan pa rlung gis ni //
translated: With a very strong force, the wind

original: 'gro ba chu gter tshogs ni ring min 'byung ba bzhin //
analyzed: 'gro ba chu gter tshogs ni ring min 'byung ba bzhin //
translated: Causes the collection of waters of the world to arise before long.

original: dus mtha'i dus la rab tu stobs ldan mes 'bar ba //
analyzed: dus mtha'i dus la rab tu stobs ldan mes 'bar ba //
translated: At the end of time, it is burned by a very powerful fire.

original: yang yang lto ba zlum po'i nya yis kun nas khyab //
analyzed: yang yang lto ba zlum po'i nya yis kun nas khyab //
translated: Again and again, the round belly is completely covered by fish.

original: sa 'og gnas pa 'jigs pa'i sbrul gyi tshogs ldan pa //
analyzed: sa 'og gnas pa 'jigs pa'i sbrul gyi tshogs ldan pa //
translated: Possessing a collection of fearful snakes dwelling in the underworld,

original: rgya mtsho chen po yang ni zad par 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po yang ni zad par 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: The great ocean will also go to exhaustion.

original: sna tshogs pa yi dpag bsam shing gis par brgyan pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa yi dpag bsam shing gis par brgyan pa //
translated: Adorned with various wish-fulfilling trees,

original: lha yi bud med rnams kyis padmo'i chu brten pa //
analyzed: lha yi bud med rnams kyis padmo'i chu brten pa //
translated: Supported by the lotus waters of the celestial maidens,

original: gser gyi phung po me yis rnam par zhu ba ni //
analyzed: gser gyi phung po me yis rnam par zhu ba ni //
translated: The mass of gold is completely melted by fire.

original: ri rab kyang ni ras bal bzhin du yang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ri rab kyang ni ras bal bzhin du yang bar 'gyur //
translated: Mount Meru will become as light as cotton wool.

original: mchod sbyin brgya pa'i yid ni 'phrog pa rnams spangs nas //
analyzed: mchod sbyin brgya pa'i yid ni 'phrog pa rnams spangs nas //
translated: Abandoning the hundred sacrifices, the mind-stealers,

original: lha rnams kyis ni grong khyer lha min rab tsha ba //
analyzed: lha rnams kyis ni grong khyer lha min rab tsha ba //
translated: the gods will go to the city of the asuras,

original: 'byor pa 'bar ba gang du yang ni 'gro 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'byor pa 'bar ba gang du yang ni 'gro 'gyur te //
translated: the blazing wealth of which is like a blazing fire.

original: sprin rnams zad la sgeg pa med pa'i glog bzhin no //
analyzed: sprin rnams zad la sgeg pa med pa'i glog bzhin no //
translated: Like a cloud that has lost its lightning, it is no longer beautiful.

original: 'di dag kyang ni mun pa rnam rgyas 'bigs byed pa //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang ni mun pa rnam rgyas 'bigs byed pa //
translated: These, too, are pierced by the expanding darkness,

original: nyin dang mtshan mo'i khyad par dag ni ldan pa ltar //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo'i khyad par dag ni ldan pa ltar //
translated: as if they were endowed with the distinction of day and night.

original: 'gro ba'i mar me nyi ma bsil ba'i 'od zer dag / dmar ba'i stobs ldan dkyil 'khor snang bar gyur pa min //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mar me nyi ma bsil ba'i 'od zer dag / dmar ba'i stobs ldan dkyil 'khor snang bar gyur pa min //
translated: The world’s lamp, the sun, is not the light that illuminates the mandala of the red-hued power.

original: gang zhig skye ba dang ldan cung zad sa gsum po 'dir yod //
analyzed: gang zhig skye ba dang ldan cung zad sa gsum po 'dir yod //
translated: Whatever exists here on the three levels that is subject to birth

original: de dag thams cad nyid ni nges par 'jig pa'i mtha' ma can //
analyzed: de dag thams cad nyid ni nges par 'jig pa'i mtha' ma can //
translated: all of it is certainly subject to destruction.

original: de ltar shes na skye dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rjes 'brel ba'i //
analyzed: de ltar shes na skye dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rjes 'brel ba'i //
translated: Knowing this, the suffering of birth and death is connected

original: 'jig rten la ni rnam skyo zhi ba nyid la yid gtad bya //
analyzed: 'jig rten la ni rnam skyo zhi ba nyid la yid gtad bya //
translated: You should turn your mind to peace, which is the only thing that can comfort the world.

original: gang zhig blo ngan gnyen 'dun rnams la mnyes gshin nges zhugs byed //
analyzed: gang zhig blo ngan gnyen 'dun rnams la mnyes gshin nges zhugs byed //
translated: Those who are attached to their friends and relatives, who are of little intelligence,

original: de ni tha mar yongs gdungs mya ngan byed cing nyer 'gro ba //🔽'jigs pa'i chu srin la brten chu bo'i dbus dag ces //
analyzed: de ni tha mar yongs gdungs mya ngan byed cing nyer 'gro ba // 'jigs pa'i chu srin la brten chu bo'i dbus dag ces //
translated: will in the end be tormented and grieve, as they are carried away.🔽Like a boat in the middle of the ocean,

original: rgya mtshor gzings dang bral bas rab tu ltung ba ster bar byed //
analyzed: rgya mtshor gzings dang bral bas rab tu ltung ba ster bar byed //
translated: which has been separated from its sail and is tossed about by the sea monster of fear.

original: su yi rnam bral yod par mi 'gyur te //🔽skye bo mnyes gshin de ring mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: su yi rnam bral yod par mi 'gyur te // skye bo mnyes gshin de ring mi 'gyur ba //
translated: Who can be sure that they will not be separated?

original: bzang mo 'byung bar @153b 'gyur ram mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: bzang mo 'byung bar @153b 'gyur ram mi 'gyur ba //
translated: Today you are loved, but who knows what will happen tomorrow?

original: de ltar khyed kyis mya ngan bsang bar gyis //
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis mya ngan bsang bar gyis //
translated: Good woman, you should dispel your sorrow.

original: de ltar bud med des byang chub sems dpa'i tshig yang dag par shes nas dran pa nye bar rnyed pas smras pa /
analyzed: de ltar bud med des byang chub sems dpa'i tshig yang dag par shes nas dran pa nye bar rnyed pas smras pa /
translated: The woman understood the bodhisattva’s words and, regaining her composure, said:

original: ae ma'o khyod kyis gdams ngag gi mar me 'dis gang nas kyang 'ongs ba ci yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa'i mun pa bsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o khyod kyis gdams ngag gi mar me 'dis gang nas kyang 'ongs ba ci yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa'i mun pa bsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Ah! By this lamp of your instruction, the darkness of the unreal imagination is dispelled from everywhere.”

original: khyed la brten nas bdag gi sems //🔽ji ltar sos pa nyer song ba //
analyzed: khyed la brten nas bdag gi sems // ji ltar sos pa nyer song ba //
translated: “Relying on you, my mind🔽has become well and truly healthy.

original: de bzhin yang dag lam dmigs nas //
analyzed: de bzhin yang dag lam dmigs nas //
translated: In the same way, having perceived the true path,🔽may you also attain nirvana.”

original: khyed kyang mya ngan 'das thob shog / de nas byang chub sems dpas bud med de rang bzhin du gnas pa bzung nas gnyen 'dun rnams kyi mdun du khrid par gyur to //
analyzed: khyed kyang mya ngan 'das thob shog / de nas byang chub sems dpas bud med de rang bzhin du gnas pa bzung nas gnyen 'dun rnams kyi mdun du khrid par gyur to //
translated: Then the Bodhisattva, having taken the woman back to her normal state, led her in front of her relatives.

original: thabs 'di ni bdag gi bud med 'di la gdon de kun nas bsal bar byas so zhes bya ba yang rang gi slob ma rnams la smras par gyur to //
analyzed: thabs 'di ni bdag gi bud med 'di la gdon de kun nas bsal bar byas so zhes bya ba yang rang gi slob ma rnams la smras par gyur to //
translated: And he said to his disciples: “By this method, I have completely removed the demon from this woman of mine.”

original: bdag nyid chen po de ra song ba la yang 'jigs pa dang 'dra ba grong khyer de las nad rnams slar rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po de ra song ba la yang 'jigs pa dang 'dra ba grong khyer de las nad rnams slar rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: And when the great being left, the city was as if frightened, and the diseases were completely destroyed.

original: de nas der la la zhig blo gros gsal ba'i nye gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di ltar yang dag par bstod cing gnas te /
analyzed: de nas der la la zhig blo gros gsal ba'i nye gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di ltar yang dag par bstod cing gnas te /
translated: Then, a certain one, a disciple of clear intellect, praised the Bodhisattva in this way:

original: khyod kyi shes rab lhag byas nas //
analyzed: khyod kyi shes rab lhag byas nas //
translated: “Your wisdom, having surpassed

original: blo ldan rnams kyi blo rnams las //
analyzed: blo ldan rnams kyi blo rnams las //
translated: the minds of the wise,🔽your wisdom penetrates even further.

original: lhag par khyed kyi shes rab 'jug / de nyid mthong ba rnams dben rnams kyi bla ma khyed la ni ;
analyzed: lhag par khyed kyi shes rab 'jug / de nyid mthong ba rnams dben rnams kyi bla ma khyed la ni ;
translated: To you, the guru of those who see reality and are detached,

original: / lci ba'i tshig ldan nges pa'i gtam ni rnam par rgyas byed la //
analyzed: / lci ba'i tshig ldan nges pa'i gtam ni rnam par rgyas byed la //
translated: the one with weighty words, the one who expands certain speech,

original: mkhas pa rnams kyi yid ni mun pas zil gyis gnon min te //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyi yid ni mun pas zil gyis gnon min te //
translated: the one whose mind is not overcome by the darkness of the wise,

original: khang pa'i nang na mar me 'bar bar byed pa bzhin du yin //
analyzed: khang pa'i nang na mar me 'bar bar byed pa bzhin du yin //
translated: like a lamp that is lit in a house.

original: 'dun par blo ldan rnams kyi 'dun pa chen po 'joms phyir mi shes pa ni rab 'byung min //
analyzed: 'dun par blo ldan rnams kyi 'dun pa chen po 'joms phyir mi shes pa ni rab 'byung min //
translated: The ignorance of the wise is not for the sake of destroying great aspiration,

original: khyed kyi ngag gi rnam par dben byed the tshom gcod cing nyon mongs med pa ma thob nas //
analyzed: khyed kyi ngag gi rnam par dben byed the tshom gcod cing nyon mongs med pa ma thob nas //
translated: but for the sake of cutting through doubt and attaining the absence of afflictions.

original: gang phyir mkha' snang rnams kyi 'od zer mtshan mo las byung rnam khyab rab rib 'joms pa min //
analyzed: gang phyir mkha' snang rnams kyi 'od zer mtshan mo las byung rnam khyab rab rib 'joms pa min //
translated: The rays of the stars, which appear in the sky, do not dispel the darkness that spreads at night.

original: mar me'i lce ni gcig pur dri ma med bas srab pa de ni ma lus sel bar byed //
analyzed: mar me'i lce ni gcig pur dri ma med bas srab pa de ni ma lus sel bar byed //
translated: But the flame of a lamp, being single, thin, and pure, dispels the darkness completely.

original: khyed ni rang rigs mkha' chen gyi ni zla yin khyed kyi grags pa rnams ni skar ma rnams //
analyzed: khyed ni rang rigs mkha' chen gyi ni zla yin khyed kyi grags pa rnams ni skar ma rnams //
translated: You are the moon of the great sky of your own tradition; your fame is the stars.

original: mthug pa'i mun pa'i chogs ni rab tu nyams par byed pa khyed kyi ngag ni zla tshes yin //
analyzed: mthug pa'i mun pa'i chogs ni rab tu nyams par byed pa khyed kyi ngag ni zla tshes yin //
translated: Your speech, which is like the crescent moon, destroys the thick mass of darkness.

original: nyan pa po rnams ku mu ta yi 'byung gnas ltar ni mdun du 'di rnams rab tu sad bar 'gro //
analyzed: nyan pa po rnams ku mu ta yi 'byung gnas ltar ni mdun du 'di rnams rab tu sad bar 'gro //
translated: Your listeners, like the opening buds of the night-blooming lotus, are awakened.

original: ae ma rnam par nges pa'i @154a * //
analyzed: ae ma rnam par nges pa'i @154a * //
translated: Oh, this composition on the ascertainment of the nature of things,

original: gtam gyi rtsom pa mtshan mo'i sgor 'byung kun nas rdzogs pa 'di //
analyzed: gtam gyi rtsom pa mtshan mo'i sgor 'byung kun nas rdzogs pa 'di //
translated: which appears like the opening of the night-lotus, is complete.

original: don spyi'i grub mtha' la ni shin tu rnon pos kyang ni nyid kyi brjod bya ji tsam rtogs //
analyzed: don spyi'i grub mtha' la ni shin tu rnon pos kyang ni nyid kyi brjod bya ji tsam rtogs //
translated: Even those who are very sharp in the tenets of general meaning understand only a portion of your subject matter.

original: de nyid mthong ba khyod kyi grol ba la ni nyan pa pos ni de nyid gsal bar mthong //
analyzed: de nyid mthong ba khyod kyi grol ba la ni nyan pa pos ni de nyid gsal bar mthong //
translated: You are liberated by seeing that very reality, and the hearer clearly sees that very reality.

original: sngon rol du ni phrad par 'dod pa'i ci nus 'jo bar byas pa'i ba las 'thung bas ni //
analyzed: sngon rol du ni phrad par 'dod pa'i ci nus 'jo bar byas pa'i ba las 'thung bas ni //
translated: The calf, desiring to meet its mother, drinks milk from her udder as much as it can.

original: phyis ni she ma skyo bar mi 'gyur sems dang ldan pa'i phyir ni bde bar 'o ma 'dzin //
analyzed: phyis ni she ma skyo bar mi 'gyur sems dang ldan pa'i phyir ni bde bar 'o ma 'dzin //
translated: Later, it does not become tired of drinking milk, because it has a mind that is happy.

original: de bas na skye bo 'di mgon dang bcas pa ste gang gi gzugs dang ldan pa ltar dam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i mkhan po nyid rjes su bstan par byed pa yod do //
analyzed: de bas na skye bo 'di mgon dang bcas pa ste gang gi gzugs dang ldan pa ltar dam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i mkhan po nyid rjes su bstan par byed pa yod do //
translated: Therefore, this person has a protector, just as if he had a form. The master himself, endowed with the true Dharma, teaches the Dharma.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: de yi gzugs ni khyad par du yang mdzes pa mthong nas ni // chu las skyes pa'i rdul ltar 'jam pa'i lus kyi srog shing gi // bzhin gyi ri bong can gyi mdzes pa ma lus 'phrog byed pa'i //
translated: Seeing that his body was especially beautiful,🔽his father, the sage Puṣya,

original: pha ni dga' bas dpe med ma zhes ming du btags par gyur //
analyzed: pha ni dga' bas dpe med ma zhes ming du btags par gyur //
translated: named him Anupama, “Without Equal,”🔽because his body was like the trunk of an elephant,🔽and because his face, which was like the moon,🔽stole the beauty of the moon.

original: de nas dpe med mas lo gnyis lon ba dang de'i pha ma dag 'jig rten gzhan du nye bar song bar gyur to //
analyzed: de nas dpe med mas lo gnyis lon ba dang de'i pha ma dag 'jig rten gzhan du nye bar song bar gyur to //
translated: Then, after two years had passed, the parents of Anupamā went to the other world.

original: rgyas pa'i sras de'i gzhan dag la rgyas pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i gtso bo grogs po byung bar gyur to //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i sras de'i gzhan dag la rgyas pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i gtso bo grogs po byung bar gyur to //
translated: The son of the king, who was a friend of the prince, became the best of all the friends of the prince.

original: des kyang yang dag par nye bar 'ongs te dpe med ma'i rang gi skye bo la smras pa /
analyzed: des kyang yang dag par nye bar 'ongs te dpe med ma'i rang gi skye bo la smras pa /
translated: He came to Anupamā and said to her relatives:

original: mtho ris su nye bar song ba'i grogs po de la dpe med ma 'di'i 'o ma bdag ni pha yin te /
analyzed: mtho ris su nye bar song ba'i grogs po de la dpe med ma 'di'i 'o ma bdag ni pha yin te /
translated: “This friend of mine has gone to heaven. I am the father of Anupamā.

original: de bas na mya ngan gyis chog gis gal te yang khyed cag la 'dod na de bas na bdag gi 'di gar gyi cha rnams la mkhas pa byed par 'gyur zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de bas na mya ngan gyis chog gis gal te yang khyed cag la 'dod na de bas na bdag gi 'di gar gyi cha rnams la mkhas pa byed par 'gyur zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, enough of this grief. If you wish, then I will be skilled in the parts of dancing.”

original: rang gi skye bos de ltar bgyi zhes bya ba so sor thos pa la gtso bo des dpe med ma blangs nas rang gi khyim du khyer te dus ring ba ma yin pa nyid kyis yi ge rnams la mkhas par byas te /
analyzed: rang gi skye bos de ltar bgyi zhes bya ba so sor thos pa la gtso bo des dpe med ma blangs nas rang gi khyim du khyer te dus ring ba ma yin pa nyid kyis yi ge rnams la mkhas par byas te /
translated: The father said, Let it be so, and the chief, having taken Anavatapta, took him to his own house, and in no long time he became skilled in the letters.

original: gar gyi cha rnams la goms shing mkhas par byas par gyur te /
analyzed: gar gyi cha rnams la goms shing mkhas par byas par gyur te /
translated: He became accustomed to and skilled in the parts of dance.

original: 'dis ni legs par bdag ni gnas la nges sbyar te //
analyzed: 'dis ni legs par bdag ni gnas la nges sbyar te //
translated: He said, I am well joined to the place.

original: bdag nyid chen po gtso bo rnams kyi mchog gis ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po gtso bo rnams kyi mchog gis ni //
translated: The chief of the great ones, the best of the best,

original: de ltar rab tu 'dzin ltar phrad 'dod de la ni //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu 'dzin ltar phrad 'dod de la ni //
translated: I desire to meet him who holds it thus.

original: nyi ma @159b re rer gar gyi chas ni kun 'khyud gyur //
analyzed: nyi ma @159b re rer gar gyi chas ni kun 'khyud gyur //
translated: May he embrace me every day with the parts of dance.

original: de nas gtso bo des gar gyi cha ma lus pa de la grub pa'i ngo bor byas nas bu mchog la rab tu byin par gyur to //🔽grong khyer de la yang mi'i bdag pos bos nas gtso bo de la smras pa /
analyzed: de nas gtso bo des gar gyi cha ma lus pa de la grub pa'i ngo bor byas nas bu mchog la rab tu byin par gyur to // grong khyer de la yang mi'i bdag pos bos nas gtso bo de la smras pa /
translated: Then the chief, having made all the parts of dance into the nature of accomplishment for him, gave them to the best son.

original: klog dang gar ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: klog dang gar ni ma lus pa //
translated: And the lord of men, having called the city, said to the chief, You have taught him reading and all the dance,

original: gang gis khyed kyis mnyen dang / mthong //
analyzed: gang gis khyed kyis mnyen dang / mthong //
translated: and you have seen his suppleness.

original: 'jig rten 'di la de nyid kyi //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di la de nyid kyi //
translated: The world, with its ears, eyes, and mind,

original: 'bras bcas rna ba mig dang sems //
analyzed: 'bras bcas rna ba mig dang sems //
translated: is intent on this very thing.

original: de bas 'dir ni gar mchog ni //
analyzed: de bas 'dir ni gar mchog ni //
translated: Therefore, here, the supreme dance

original: gar gyi dbang phyug ston byed pa'i //
analyzed: gar gyi dbang phyug ston byed pa'i //
translated: is shown by the Lord of Dance.

original: khyed la lta bar 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: khyed la lta bar 'dod pa ste //
translated: I wish to see you,

original: khyim du btsun 'khor bcas skye bo //
analyzed: khyim du btsun 'khor bcas skye bo //
translated: together with your retinue of queens in the palace.

original: gtso bos smras pa /
analyzed: gtso bos smras pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: khyed 'dra rtogs ldan sa li dbang phyug yod pa la//
analyzed: khyed 'dra rtogs ldan sa li dbang phyug yod pa la//
translated: For one like you, O Salīdhara,

original: sbyor ba byed pa'i yid ni bde blag bya bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sbyor ba byed pa'i yid ni bde blag bya bar 'gyur //
translated: the mind engaged in practice will easily be at ease.

original: shar nas gnas pa'i bde mthong 'gro ba'i 'od can la //
analyzed: shar nas gnas pa'i bde mthong 'gro ba'i 'od can la //
translated: The one who sees happiness from the east, the light of beings,

original: ze'u 'bru kun nas dbugs ni 'byung ba padma ltar //
analyzed: ze'u 'bru kun nas dbugs ni 'byung ba padma ltar //
translated: like a lotus with its stamen fully exhaling.

original: ae ma yid kyi rnam 'gyur gsal bar rab tu 'gro ste gang gi nyams rnams kyis //
analyzed: ae ma yid kyi rnam 'gyur gsal bar rab tu 'gro ste gang gi nyams rnams kyis //
translated: Ah! The clear expression of the mind moves forth, by whose experiences

original: shin tu glu yi rnam 'gyur de rnams rjes lhung nyams kyi dbang gis gdon par mdzod //
analyzed: shin tu glu yi rnam 'gyur de rnams rjes lhung nyams kyi dbang gis gdon par mdzod //
translated: those very expressions of song are to be sung by the power of experience.

original: kun nas 'gro ba 'di yang sgeg cing rkang pa rnams par bkod pas 'jam pa ni //
analyzed: kun nas 'gro ba 'di yang sgeg cing rkang pa rnams par bkod pas 'jam pa ni //
translated: This entire world, graceful and soft with its well-placed feet,

original: de ltar brjod cing ltad mo ba ni 'phrog byed gar mkhan la yang spro ba skyed //
analyzed: de ltar brjod cing ltad mo ba ni 'phrog byed gar mkhan la yang spro ba skyed //
translated: Thus speaking, he delights the spectators, even the celestial actors.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i lha yang ltad mo ba ste de bas na bdag gi rjes su 'dzin pa ste gal te bdag gar gyi bstan bcos rab tu sbyor zhing lhas mthong bar 'dod ces zer ro //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i lha yang ltad mo ba ste de bas na bdag gi rjes su 'dzin pa ste gal te bdag gar gyi bstan bcos rab tu sbyor zhing lhas mthong bar 'dod ces zer ro //
translated: In this way, the gods are also spectators. Therefore, if I am to perform the treatise on dance, may the gods see it.

original: rgyal pos smras pa //
analyzed: rgyal pos smras pa //
translated: The king said:

original: de bas na dus 'da' bas chog ste gar gyi cho ga rab tu rtsom pa nyid du mdzod cig ces zer ro //
analyzed: de bas na dus 'da' bas chog ste gar gyi cho ga rab tu rtsom pa nyid du mdzod cig ces zer ro //
translated: Therefore, enough with the delay. Let the performance of the dance ritual commence.

original: de ltar bgyi 'o zhes bya ba gtso bo des so sor mnyan nas mig la dga' bar gyur pa ltad mo'i khyim rnam par bsams na //
analyzed: de ltar bgyi 'o zhes bya ba gtso bo des so sor mnyan nas mig la dga' bar gyur pa ltad mo'i khyim rnam par bsams na //
translated: The principal one said, So be it, and having listened, he contemplated the house of spectacle, delightful to the eyes.

original: btsun mo'i 'khor dang blon po dang grong khyer ba'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyal po de yang dag par nye bar bzhugs pa la rdza rda'i sgras kun nas khyab pa'i mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du zlos gar mkhan gyis shis pa brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gdon
analyzed: btsun mo'i 'khor dang blon po dang grong khyer ba'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyal po de yang dag par nye bar bzhugs pa la rdza rda'i sgras kun nas khyab pa'i mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du zlos gar mkhan gyis shis pa brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gdon
translated: The king, together with his retinue of queens, ministers, and townspeople, was seated properly. In the king's palace, pervaded by the sound of the clay drum, the dancer recited the auspicious verses.

original: pa sngon du 'gro bar gar gyi cho ga rab tu skabs phye bar byas pa la /
analyzed: pa sngon du 'gro bar gar gyi cho ga rab tu skabs phye bar byas pa la /
translated: Having gone before, he performed the ritual of dance.

original: gtso bo des dpe med ma dang lhan cig tu ltad mo ba rnams kyi sar rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: gtso bo des dpe med ma dang lhan cig tu ltad mo ba rnams kyi sar rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
translated: The chief, together with Anupamā, entered the arena of the spectators.

original: kun nas thos par byed cing rdza rnga'i sprin gyi sgra chen po //
analyzed: kun nas thos par byed cing rdza rnga'i sprin gyi sgra chen po //
translated: The sound of the great cloud of the clay drum was heard all around.

original: gar de sprin gyi dus na mig rnams la ni mngon par dga' //🔽dgod pas snang bar @160a * //
analyzed: gar de sprin gyi dus na mig rnams la ni mngon par dga' // dgod pas snang bar @160a * //
translated: That dance, in the time of the cloud, was delightful to the eyes.🔽With a face illuminated by laughter,

original: byas pa'i gdong can sgeg cing mngon dga' ba //
analyzed: byas pa'i gdong can sgeg cing mngon dga' ba //
translated: graceful and delightful,

original: gar mkhan mo yi glog de ma lus pa ni brgyan par byas //
analyzed: gar mkhan mo yi glog de ma lus pa ni brgyan par byas //
translated: the dancer's lightning was adorned in every way.

original: gtso bo'i dpyid ni mdzes pa ma nyams yang dag thob nas ni //
analyzed: gtso bo'i dpyid ni mdzes pa ma nyams yang dag thob nas ni //
translated: The principal one, having obtained the perfect, unimpaired beauty,

original: de ni 'jam pas dgod pa'i dbang gis bzhin gyi chu skyes kyi //
analyzed: de ni 'jam pas dgod pa'i dbang gis bzhin gyi chu skyes kyi //
translated: with a gentle smile, on the lotus of her face,

original: sor phreng 'od zer ze'u 'bru can na cung zad du //
analyzed: sor phreng 'od zer ze'u 'bru can na cung zad du //
translated: on the pistil of the light-ray of the ring finger,

original: dpe med ma yin padmo sgeg dang bcas par gsal byas gyur //🔽nyams ni gang gang ston par byed cing sgeg dang bcas par nyams ldan nas //
analyzed: dpe med ma yin padmo sgeg dang bcas par gsal byas gyur // nyams ni gang gang ston par byed cing sgeg dang bcas par nyams ldan nas //
translated: she made the incomparable Padma clear, along with the lotus's playfulness.🔽Whatever posture she displayed, with playfulness and grace,

original: de ni gang du shin tu dgar 'gyur yan lag srog shing can //
analyzed: de ni gang du shin tu dgar 'gyur yan lag srog shing can //
translated: that became the very essence of her joy, with limbs as if made of bamboo.

original: mtshar bas legs so legs so zhes ni skye bo kun brjod cing ;
analyzed: mtshar bas legs so legs so zhes ni skye bo kun brjod cing ;
translated: All the people exclaimed, Excellent, excellent!

original: / de la bltas nas phrad 'dod phyir ni de rang bzhin ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: / de la bltas nas phrad 'dod phyir ni de rang bzhin ltar 'gyur //
translated: Looking at her, they became like her, desiring to meet her.

original: bud med gzugs ni zla ba ltar ni yid 'ong sgeg spangs kyang //
analyzed: bud med gzugs ni zla ba ltar ni yid 'ong sgeg spangs kyang //
translated: A woman's form, though not as beautiful as the moon, abandoned playfulness,

original: skye bo sems ni phrad par 'dod pa byed pa nyid yin te //
analyzed: skye bo sems ni phrad par 'dod pa byed pa nyid yin te //
translated: but still made the minds of men desirous of union.

original: ngo tsha sgeg dang 'jam pa'i dgod pas mchu ni bskum byas pa //
analyzed: ngo tsha sgeg dang 'jam pa'i dgod pas mchu ni bskum byas pa //
translated: With bashfulness, playfulness, and gentle laughter, her lips slightly pursed,

original: yid kyi rnam 'gyur ldan pa'i sna tshogs cha mkhas smos ci dgos //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam 'gyur ldan pa'i sna tshogs cha mkhas smos ci dgos //
translated: What need to speak of the various aspects of mental expression?

original: de nas dka' thub pa'i sras gzhan dag dka' thub spyod pa'i yongs su ngal bas yid skyob nyid kyis 'di ltar bsams par gyur to //🔽rang bzhin gyis rtsub pa'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu mngon par zos pas mod pa'i sdug bsngal nye bar lhung bas bzod par dka' ba'i ri dags kyi pags pa dang shing gi lo ma tsam gyon pas sra ba la nyal bas lus skyo ba'i dka' thub kyi nags
analyzed: de nas dka' thub pa'i sras gzhan dag dka' thub spyod pa'i yongs su ngal bas yid skyob nyid kyis 'di ltar bsams par gyur to // rang bzhin gyis rtsub pa'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu mngon par zos pas mod pa'i sdug bsngal nye bar lhung bas bzod par dka' ba'i ri dags kyi pags pa dang shing gi lo ma tsam gyon pas sra ba la nyal bas lus skyo ba'i dka' thub kyi nags
translated: Then the other sons of the ascetics, their minds weary from the fatigue of practicing austerities, thought this:

original: na gnas pas bdag la chog ste /
analyzed: na gnas pas bdag la chog ste /
translated: “We are content with the hardship of austerities, which is difficult to bear because of the suffering of eating roots and fruits that are naturally coarse, sleeping on the hard ground covered only by the hide of a deer or a leaf, and the fatigue of the body from living in the forest.

original: de bas na bdag ni song ste khyim na gnas pa nyid du bya dgos snyam mo //
analyzed: de bas na bdag ni song ste khyim na gnas pa nyid du bya dgos snyam mo //
translated: Therefore, we should go and live at home.”

original: rab tu dga' ba'i khyim bdag mo kun nas don du gnyer ba'i skye bo tsho bar gyur pa na me mchod kyi dubs gtsang bar byas pa dang / bud med rnams kyis ba rnams kyi be'u la rab tu rtse bar byed pa dang / shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog rnams kyis lha'i gnas mchod pa dang /
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i khyim bdag mo kun nas don du gnyer ba'i skye bo tsho bar gyur pa na me mchod kyi dubs gtsang bar byas pa dang / bud med rnams kyis ba rnams kyi be'u la rab tu rtse bar byed pa dang / shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog rnams kyis lha'i gnas mchod pa dang /
translated: The householder's wife was very happy. When the people who were seeking the meaning of the dream arrived, they cleaned the place of the fire sacrifice. The women played with the calves of the cows. They made offerings to the gods with very fragrant flowers.

original: kun nas 'byung ba'i kunda sar pa ltar dkar ba'i zho dang bsres pa'i gtor ma rnam par bkod nga pa  shar phyogs su bsres pa dang / tho rangs dang mtshan mo'i sgo rnams la ba lang skyong bar byed pa rnams kyis ba rnams 'jo bar byed bas 'o ma'i rgyun gyi sgra thos pa dang /
analyzed: kun nas 'byung ba'i kunda sar pa ltar dkar ba'i zho dang bsres pa'i gtor ma rnam par bkod nga pa  shar phyogs su bsres pa dang / tho rangs dang mtshan mo'i sgo rnams la ba lang skyong bar byed pa rnams kyis ba rnams 'jo bar byed bas 'o ma'i rgyun gyi sgra thos pa dang /
translated: They arranged an offering of curd mixed with white milk that was as white as a new jasmine flower and placed it in the east. In the morning and evening the cowherds milked the cows at the door and the sound of the stream of milk was heard.

original: nyi ma re re'i rjes la mngon par 'ongs pa'i grogs po skye bo'i gtam gyis dga' bar gyur pa bram ze nyan pa po khyim pa su zhig @160b ces bya ba'i khyim snying dga' bar mi 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas grong khyer du 'ongs te /
analyzed: nyi ma re re'i rjes la mngon par 'ongs pa'i grogs po skye bo'i gtam gyis dga' bar gyur pa bram ze nyan pa po khyim pa su zhig @160b ces bya ba'i khyim snying dga' bar mi 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas grong khyer du 'ongs te /
translated: What householder would not be delighted by the stories of people who come every day, the stories of friends? Thinking this, he came to the city.

original: mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du rdza rnga'i sgra thos nas grong khyer ba'i skye bo yang de la mngon par phyogs par mthong nas /
analyzed: mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du rdza rnga'i sgra thos nas grong khyer ba'i skye bo yang de la mngon par phyogs par mthong nas /
translated: Hearing the sound of the clay drum in the king's palace, and seeing the people of the city also going there,

original: re zhig bdag gis kyang 'gro bar bgyis te ltad mo blta bar bgyi'o snyam du rnam par bsams nas mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du rjes su zhugs te mtha' gcig tu spo'i gdan la nye bar gnas shing sgeg pa'i rkang pa rnam par bkod pa dang /
analyzed: re zhig bdag gis kyang 'gro bar bgyis te ltad mo blta bar bgyi'o snyam du rnam par bsams nas mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du rjes su zhugs te mtha' gcig tu spo'i gdan la nye bar gnas shing sgeg pa'i rkang pa rnam par bkod pa dang /
translated: he thought, For now I too will go and see the spectacle. Thinking this, he entered the king's palace and sat on a seat in a corner, his legs arranged in a graceful way,

original: yan lag g-yo ba dang smin ma mthong pos 'di ltar rab tu bskul pa 'dra //
analyzed: yan lag g-yo ba dang smin ma mthong pos 'di ltar rab tu bskul pa 'dra //
translated: his limbs moving, his eyebrows darting, as if urging him to do so.

original: 'di ltar gyur pa'i gzhon nu ma yi gzugs ni ae ma sgeg pa yi //
analyzed: 'di ltar gyur pa'i gzhon nu ma yi gzugs ni ae ma sgeg pa yi //
translated: The form of this young woman is so beautiful!

original: mdzes pa yid 'ong su zhig yid la bde bar byed ma yin //
analyzed: mdzes pa yid 'ong su zhig yid la bde bar byed ma yin //
translated: Who would not find delightful this lovely, charming form?

original: bud med kyi gzugs 'di lta bu rnams dka' thub kyi nags na gnas pa rnams kyi mig gi yul du gang na 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: bud med kyi gzugs 'di lta bu rnams dka' thub kyi nags na gnas pa rnams kyi mig gi yul du gang na 'gro ba yin te /
translated: Where can such a woman's form be found among those who live in the forest of asceticism?

original: glu'i sgra rnams ni rna ba'i lam du ji ltar 'gro pa yin snyam pa de bas na bdag gi dka' thub kyi nags na gnas pa yongs su dor ba ni gnas yin no snyam du rnam par sems shing /
analyzed: glu'i sgra rnams ni rna ba'i lam du ji ltar 'gro pa yin snyam pa de bas na bdag gi dka' thub kyi nags na gnas pa yongs su dor ba ni gnas yin no snyam du rnam par sems shing /
translated: How can the sound of her singing reach my ears? Thus he thought, It is right for me to give up living in the forest of asceticism.

original: mig mi g-yo ba dang ldan pas dpe med ma mthong bar gyur te /🔽de bas gtso bo lta bas 'brel pa mig ni dkar rgyas pa //🔽de yi gos ni 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i lbu ba ltar dkar ba //
analyzed: mig mi g-yo ba dang ldan pas dpe med ma mthong bar gyur te / de bas gtso bo lta bas 'brel pa mig ni dkar rgyas pa // de yi gos ni 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i lbu ba ltar dkar ba //
translated: With unmoving eyes, he gazed at Anupamā.🔽His eyes, which were connected to his head by a white sinew,

original: gser gyi padma bum dang rjes su mthun ba 'dzin pa yi //
analyzed: gser gyi padma bum dang rjes su mthun ba 'dzin pa yi //
translated: were like a golden lotus,

original: 'o ma 'dzin ba gnyis las glo bur du ni cung zad lhung bar gyur //
analyzed: 'o ma 'dzin ba gnyis las glo bur du ni cung zad lhung bar gyur //
translated: and he suddenly let fall a little milk from his two breasts.

original: 'o ma 'dzin pa gnyis ni 'byung ba srab pa'i dbus kyi cha //
analyzed: 'o ma 'dzin pa gnyis ni 'byung ba srab pa'i dbus kyi cha //
translated: The two breasts are the two sources, the middle part of which is thin.

original: de la de nas rgyas pa mthong nas cung zad dgod byas te //🔽glags ni tshol la rtse gcig pa dang g-yo ba'i bsam pa can //
analyzed: de la de nas rgyas pa mthong nas cung zad dgod byas te // glags ni tshol la rtse gcig pa dang g-yo ba'i bsam pa can //
translated: Seeing that it has grown there, he laughs a little.🔽He is intent on finding an opportunity, and his mind is both fickle and concentrated.

original: yid las skyes pa'i dbang gis kun nas 'dod pa song bar gyur //
analyzed: yid las skyes pa'i dbang gis kun nas 'dod pa song bar gyur //
translated: He goes to the desired object, being driven by the mind.

original: bud med gzugs ni mthong nas ni //
analyzed: bud med gzugs ni mthong nas ni //
translated: Seeing the form of a woman,

original: dka' thub nor can legs blo yang //
analyzed: dka' thub nor can legs blo yang //
translated: even a man of good understanding, who has the wealth of asceticism,

original: brtan ni skad cig tu ni dor //
analyzed: brtan ni skad cig tu ni dor //
translated: abandons his firmness in an instant.

original: tha mal skye bo smos ci dgos //
analyzed: tha mal skye bo smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to speak of an ordinary person?

original: de nas dpe med ma steng gos lhung blangs nas gtso bo de yan lag med pa'i dbang du song bar shes nas mun pa dang bcas pa'i skye bo'i sgron mar gyur pa'i legs par bshad pa 'di ltar rab tu smras par gyur to //
analyzed: de nas dpe med ma steng gos lhung blangs nas gtso bo de yan lag med pa'i dbang du song bar shes nas mun pa dang bcas pa'i skye bo'i sgron mar gyur pa'i legs par bshad pa 'di ltar rab tu smras par gyur to //
translated: Then, having taken up the upper garment of Anuttarā, knowing that the chief one had come under the power of the limbless one, she, who was like a lamp for people in darkness, spoke these well-said words:

original: chos la yid ni nyams pa med par shin tu ring btang nas //
analyzed: chos la yid ni nyams pa med par shin tu ring btang nas //
translated: Having completely abandoned the mind that is not devoted to the Dharma,

original: su zhig dri ma dang bcas las ni dmyal ba'i don du byed //

analyzed: bdag gi yid ni pha yi khang par phrad par 'dod pa ste //
translated: my mind wanted to meet my father’s house.

original: gang gi pha yi khyim du bdag ni gnas nas de yi tshe //
analyzed: gang gi pha yi khyim du bdag ni gnas nas de yi tshe //
translated: When I was living in my father’s house,

original: shin tu phrad par 'dod pas slar yang bdag po'i khyim ni dran //
analyzed: shin tu phrad par 'dod pas slar yang bdag po'i khyim ni dran //
translated: I remembered my master’s house, thinking of him with great longing.

original: ji ltar bdag gi phrad 'dod 'di //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag gi phrad 'dod 'di //
translated: “How can I make my longing for him

original: sems la gnod byed mi 'gyur ba //🔽de ltar de nyid sa skyong ni //
analyzed: sems la gnod byed mi 'gyur ba // de ltar de nyid sa skyong ni //
translated: not harm my mind?”🔽In this way, the great-minded king

original: blo gros chen pos shes pa yin //
analyzed: blo gros chen pos shes pa yin //
translated: understood the situation.

original: de nas tshang las 'phye ba'i lcags kyi srog shing ltar gzugs nag pa lce gnyis rab tu 'phrog par byed pa'i lto 'phye phyi rol du byung ste /
analyzed: de nas tshang las 'phye ba'i lcags kyi srog shing ltar gzugs nag pa lce gnyis rab tu 'phrog par byed pa'i lto 'phye phyi rol du byung ste /
translated: Then a nāga came out of the nest, like an iron pillar, black in form, with two tongues that flickered.

original: dbyig pa can la smras pa /
analyzed: dbyig pa can la smras pa /
translated: He said to Daṇḍin:

original: bram ze chen po kye /
analyzed: bram ze chen po kye /
translated: “O great brahman,

original: bdag gi tshig gis rgyal po me long gdong can la khyod kyis dri bar byas te /
analyzed: bdag gi tshig gis rgyal po me long gdong can la khyod kyis dri bar byas te /
translated: by my words you should ask King Ādarśamukha:

original: sems 'di sreg par 'dod cing me ltar ci yi phyir na ni //
analyzed: sems 'di sreg par 'dod cing me ltar ci yi phyir na ni //
translated: ‘Why do you want to burn this mind of yours like fire?

original: tshang las phyi rol byung zhing bdag la bzod pa'i dgra 'byung ste //
analyzed: tshang las phyi rol byung zhing bdag la bzod pa'i dgra 'byung ste //
translated: A nāga has come out of the nest, an external enemy who is patient with me.

original: de la gnas shing khros pa nye bar bral ba zhi ba ni //
analyzed: de la gnas shing khros pa nye bar bral ba zhi ba ni //
translated: Dwelling on that, I am separated from the anger that is near at hand, and I am peaceful.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rtse gcig thub pa ltar ni sems ni 'gyur //
translated: As if able to concentrate, the mind is steady.

original: de las mda'i snye ma'i rtsa las shang shang de'u mngon par smras par gyur pa /
analyzed: de las mda'i snye ma'i rtsa las shang shang de'u mngon par smras par gyur pa /
translated: From that, the bird spoke, emerging from the lotus stalk of the arrow:

original: bram ze chen po bdag gi tshig gis kyang 'di ltar rgyal po me long gdong can la dri bar bya ste /
analyzed: bram ze chen po bdag gi tshig gis kyang 'di ltar rgyal po me long gdong can la dri bar bya ste /
translated: By my words, ask the king Ādarśamukha like this:

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: mda' yi snye mar 'dir gnas shing //
analyzed: mda' yi snye mar 'dir gnas shing //
translated: Here, abiding in the lotus of the arrow,

original: brtan pa mchog ni bdag gis rnyed //🔽gzhan du gnas pas ci phyir ni //
analyzed: brtan pa mchog ni bdag gis rnyed // gzhan du gnas pas ci phyir ni //
translated: I have found supreme stability.

original: bdag la 'khrugs pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag la 'khrugs pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: Why should I be disturbed by dwelling elsewhere?

original: dbyug pa can gyis smras pa /
analyzed: dbyug pa can gyis smras pa /
translated: Daṇḍa said:

analyzed: gal te 'di rnams kyi drung nas bdag la grol bar 'byung bar gyur na /

analyzed: de nas gtam 'di thams cad rgyal po la bdag gis zhus par gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then I will tell all this story to the king.

original: rim gyis kyang de rnams song ba nyid la nyi ma nub pa'i ri la lhag par 'dzegs pa ste /
analyzed: rim gyis kyang de rnams song ba nyid la nyi ma nub pa'i ri la lhag par 'dzegs pa ste /
translated: Thus, they gradually went and climbed the mountain where the sun sets.

analyzed: de nas de rnams thams cad nyid ni shing nya gro dha'i 'og tu shing gel ba'i gnas la gnas bcas par gyur to //
translated: Then all of them made their dwelling in the place of the śāla trees, under the banyan tree.

original: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus la de rnams gnyid log pa la dbyug @166b pa can gyis 'di ltar bsams par gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus la de rnams gnyid log pa la dbyug @166b pa can gyis 'di ltar bsams par gyur ro //
translated: Then, at midnight, while they were sleeping, Daṇḍakin thought like this:

original: gal te ji ltar yang bdag 'di rnams kyi tha snyad kyis pham par gyur na de nas chad pa bdag gis gang nas sbyin par bya zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gal te ji ltar yang bdag 'di rnams kyi tha snyad kyis pham par gyur na de nas chad pa bdag gis gang nas sbyin par bya zhes zer ro //
translated: “If I am defeated by their convention in any way, then from where will I give the punishment?”

original: rgyal po'i skye bo rnams kyis sdug bsngal sbyin par byed pa sdug bsngal chen po bzod par nus pa la ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyal po'i skye bo rnams kyis sdug bsngal sbyin par byed pa sdug bsngal chen po bzod par nus pa la ma yin te /
translated: The king’s people are able to give the suffering of punishment, but not the suffering of endurance.

original: de bas na shing n+ya gro dha la 'dzegs nas bdag nyid lcebs par 'gyur ba zhes rnam par bsams nas yang bcings pa bkrol nas shing n+ya gro dha la 'dzegs pa ste bdag nyid la thag pas 'gag dmig bcug par gyur to //
analyzed: de bas na shing n+ya gro dha la 'dzegs nas bdag nyid lcebs par 'gyur ba zhes rnam par bsams nas yang bcings pa bkrol nas shing n+ya gro dha la 'dzegs pa ste bdag nyid la thag pas 'gag dmig bcug par gyur to //
translated: Therefore, having climbed the banyan tree, I will kill myself.” Having thought like this, he again released the bonds, climbed the banyan tree, and put a noose around his neck.

original: de nas de mi khur chen pos /
analyzed: de nas de mi khur chen pos /
translated: Then, with that great burden of a man,

original: ro langs mnyam pa'i chos ldan pa'i//
analyzed: ro langs mnyam pa'i chos ldan pa'i//
translated: The one endowed with the Dharma equal to the zombie,🔽

original: shing gi yal ga chag gyur te //
analyzed: shing gi yal ga chag gyur te //
translated: The tree branch, which was endowed with the quality of being like a zombie, broke.

original: de las yang dag skyes pa'i sgra //
analyzed: de las yang dag skyes pa'i sgra //
translated: From that, a sound arose.

original: de nas gel ba'i bdag po de //
analyzed: de nas gel ba'i bdag po de //
translated: Then, the lord of the creepers,

original: gnyid log stong du skad cig gis //
analyzed: gnyid log stong du skad cig gis //
translated: in an instant, fell asleep and

original: lus che ba ni lhung 'gyur te //
analyzed: lus che ba ni lhung 'gyur te //
translated: his large body fell.

original: thag pas bcings pa'i skye bo can //
analyzed: thag pas bcings pa'i skye bo can //
translated: He was a person bound by ropes.

original: gel ba'i bdag pos 'jigs pa ni //
analyzed: gel ba'i bdag pos 'jigs pa ni //
translated: The lord of the creepers was frightened.

original: de nas lag ngar chag langs nas //
analyzed: de nas lag ngar chag langs nas //
translated: Then, his arm rose up

original: gnyen rnams longs shing gnas pa ste //🔽'khrug pas 'di ltar nges brjod cing //
analyzed: gnyen rnams longs shing gnas pa ste // 'khrug pas 'di ltar nges brjod cing //
translated: and his relatives gathered and said,

original: shing n+ya gro dha 'di las sha za lhung bas bdag gi rje ngar 'di chag pa ste /
analyzed: shing n+ya gro dha 'di las sha za lhung bas bdag gi rje ngar 'di chag pa ste /
translated: This is what happened: A zombie fell from this banyan tree and broke my leg.

original: de bas khyed cag rnams kyis mar me rab tu sbar bar mdzod cig ces zer ro //
analyzed: de bas khyed cag rnams kyis mar me rab tu sbar bar mdzod cig ces zer ro //
translated: Therefore, you all should light lamps.

original: de nas der kha cig rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa rnams sha za zhes bya ba thos nas phyogs rnams su mi snang bar gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas der kha cig rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa rnams sha za zhes bya ba thos nas phyogs rnams su mi snang bar gyur ro //
translated: Then, some who were naturally afraid, having heard the word zombie, disappeared in all directions.

original: gzhan dag ni me mar sbar bar bya ste //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni me mar sbar bar bya ste //
translated: Others said, We should light lamps.

original: bram ze de la mthong bar gyur te //
analyzed: bram ze de la mthong bar gyur te //
translated: The king saw the brahmin and said to him, What is this?

original: lhung bas rma byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis kun nas 'khrugs pa'i blo can dbugs dbyung ba mthong nas kyang gdug pa'i bdag nyid can /
analyzed: lhung bas rma byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis kun nas 'khrugs pa'i blo can dbugs dbyung ba mthong nas kyang gdug pa'i bdag nyid can /
translated: Seeing him distressed by the pain of his fall, the king, though a man of violent nature, said to him, I grant you safety.

original: khyod kyis gel ba'i bdag po'i rje par chag pa ste /
analyzed: khyod kyis gel ba'i bdag po'i rje par chag pa ste /
translated: You have broken the branch of the tree, said the brahmin.

analyzed: de bas na tshur shog rgyal po'i drung du 'gro bar bya zhes zer ro //
translated: Come, let us go to the king.

original: gel ba srung ba de rnams kyis kyang tho rangs kyi dus na gzhan de rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i drung du khrid par gyur to //
analyzed: gel ba srung ba de rnams kyis kyang tho rangs kyi dus na gzhan de rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i drung du khrid par gyur to //
translated: The next morning the tree guards took him to the king together with the others.

original: de nas mdun sar bzhugs pa'i dus la dbyig pa can dang lhan cig tu de rnams thams cad sgo bas rgyal po me long gdong can gyi drung du nye bar khrid de /
analyzed: de nas mdun sar bzhugs pa'i dus la dbyig pa can dang lhan cig tu de rnams thams cad sgo bas rgyal po me long gdong can gyi drung du nye bar khrid de /
translated: Then, at the time of the court, the doorkeeper led all of them, including Daṇḍin, into the presence of King Ādarśamukha.

original: gnyis skyes de ni shin tu 'jigs pas brgyal ba'i yid //
analyzed: gnyis skyes de ni shin tu 'jigs pas brgyal ba'i yid //
translated: The camel, his mind stunned by fear, was unconscious.

original: de nas sa yi bdag pos de ni mthong gyur na //
analyzed: de nas sa yi bdag pos de ni mthong gyur na //
translated: Then the king saw him and said to the tree guards, What is this?🔽 They said, Your Majesty, this man broke the branch of the tree and fell down.

original: snying rje'i dbang gis brlan pa'i yid ni 'gyur ba ste //🔽sa gsum la ni gcig tu phan phyir yang dag brtson //
analyzed: snying rje'i dbang gis brlan pa'i yid ni 'gyur ba ste // sa gsum la ni gcig tu phan phyir yang dag brtson //
translated: His mind was moistened with compassion, and he was moved.
He was truly intent on the welfare of the three worlds.

original: rnams thams cad kyis kyang rim gyis dbyig pa can gyi nyes pa brjod par gyur pa dang de nas rgyal po des yin par gyis shig / thabs dang bcas par bdag gis bram ze 'di grol bar byed par 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas smras pa /
analyzed: rnams thams cad kyis kyang rim gyis dbyig pa can gyi nyes pa brjod par gyur pa dang de nas rgyal po des yin par gyis shig / thabs dang bcas par bdag gis bram ze 'di grol bar byed par 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas smras pa /
translated: All of them, in turn, reported the fault of Daṇḍakin. Then the king thought, “I will free this brahmin by means of a stratagem.”

analyzed: tha snyad ma thob pa'i bram ze 'di ci'i phyir khyed rnams kyis bsad pa dang bcings pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pas kun nas khyer ba ste /
translated: He said, “Why have you, who have not attained the status of a brahmin, been carried away by the defilements of killing and binding?

original: de bas na khyed rnams thams cad nyid chad pa gcad par 'os so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de bas na khyed rnams thams cad nyid chad pa gcad par 'os so zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, all of you are worthy of punishment.”

original: yang na bram ze 'di grol bar gyis shig ces zer ro //
analyzed: yang na bram ze 'di grol bar gyis shig ces zer ro //

original: de rnams kyang chad pas 'jigs pas de bkrol nas gnas ji lta bar kun nas song bar gyur to //
analyzed: de rnams kyang chad pas 'jigs pas de bkrol nas gnas ji lta bar kun nas song bar gyur to //

original: dbyig pa can dga' ba'i yid can des kyang rgyal po de la shis pa brjod pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod par byas te /
analyzed: dbyig pa can dga' ba'i yid can des kyang rgyal po de la shis pa brjod pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod par byas te /
translated: The delighted club-bearer praised the king with auspicious words

original: rigs kyi bud med la sogs pa de rnams kyi gtam de zhus par gyur to //
analyzed: rigs kyi bud med la sogs pa de rnams kyi gtam de zhus par gyur to //
translated: and asked about the story of the noble woman and so on.

original: de nas rgyal po des thos nas smras pa /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po des thos nas smras pa /
translated: Then the king, having heard it, said:

original: rigs kyi bud med de la 'di ltar brjod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi bud med de la 'di ltar brjod par bya ba ste /
translated: You should speak to that noble woman like this:

original: bdag po'i khyim du song ba pha'i khyim du yang //
analyzed: bdag po'i khyim du song ba pha'i khyim du yang //
translated: 'Having gone to the house of a master, also to the house of a father,

original: skyes pa gzhan dag 'dod pa gdungs pa mngon par 'dod //
analyzed: skyes pa gzhan dag 'dod pa gdungs pa mngon par 'dod //
translated: other men openly desire the one tormented by passion.

original: de ltar 'dar bar byed cing me dang sol bltar //
analyzed: de ltar 'dar bar byed cing me dang sol bltar //
translated: Thus trembling, like one looking at fire or charcoal,

original: gzhan dang 'brel ba'i sems ldan brtan pa khyod mi rnyed //
analyzed: gzhan dang 'brel ba'i sems ldan brtan pa khyod mi rnyed //
translated: you, steadfast one with a mind connected to another, are not found.

original: gal te yid ni 'tsho 'dod na //🔽de dag las ni sems zlog cig / don med kun rtog gis rmongs pa'i //
analyzed: gal te yid ni 'tsho 'dod na // de dag las ni sems zlog cig / don med kun rtog gis rmongs pa'i //
translated: If the mind desires to live,🔽turn it away from those things.

original: skye bo 'ga' zhig bde ba med //
analyzed: skye bo 'ga' zhig bde ba med //
translated: Some people, deluded by useless conceptualization, have no happiness.

original: sbrul la yang ni brjod bya ste //
analyzed: sbrul la yang ni brjod bya ste //
translated: You should also speak to the snake:

original: gal te khyod ni bde bar 'dod //
analyzed: gal te khyod ni bde bar 'dod //
translated: 'If you desire happiness,

original: srog chags su zhig mthong nas ni //
analyzed: srog chags su zhig mthong nas ni //
translated: What living being is there to be seen

original: khro ba byed par 'os pa min //
analyzed: khro ba byed par 'os pa min //
translated: that is worthy of anger?

original: gang zhig khro pa'i me ni spar byas nas //
analyzed: gang zhig khro pa'i me ni spar byas nas //
translated: He who, having kindled the fire of anger,🔽burns his own mind and also others,

original: rang gi yid ni tshig ste gzhan yang sreg / nges par rmongs pa'i sems dang ldan bde //
analyzed: rang gi yid ni tshig ste gzhan yang sreg / nges par rmongs pa'i sems dang ldan bde //
translated: is certainly one who has a deluded mind,🔽and becomes fuel for the fire of hell.

original: dmyal ba'i me yi bud shing nyid du 'gro / shang shang de'u la yang smra bar bya ste /
analyzed: dmyal ba'i me yi bud shing nyid du 'gro / shang shang de'u la yang smra bar bya ste /
translated: And to the peacock he should say:

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: “Just as there is a treasure

original: mda' yi gel ba'i 'og tu ni //🔽gter ni yod pa des khyod ni //
analyzed: mda' yi gel ba'i 'og tu ni // gter ni yod pa des khyod ni //
translated: under the arrow-head,

original: gnas shing shin tu de la yang //
analyzed: gnas shing shin tu de la yang //
translated: by which you live and are very happy,

original: yid ni brtan ldan skye ba yin //
analyzed: yid ni brtan ldan skye ba yin //
translated: and your mind is full of confidence,🔽so also, having dug up that treasure,

original: gter de yang brkos nas khyed dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang rnam par bral ba bde bar khyim gyi gnas rjes su skyong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gter de yang brkos nas khyed dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang rnam par bral ba bde bar khyim gyi gnas rjes su skyong bar 'gyur te /
translated: you will be free from the suffering of poverty and be happy, and will look after your home.

original: de bas na song shig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na song shig ces bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, go!”

original: de nas dbyig pa can rgyal po de'i blo'i khyad par gyis blo la ngo mtshar skyes pas zhus par @167b gyur te /
analyzed: de nas dbyig pa can rgyal po de'i blo'i khyad par gyis blo la ngo mtshar skyes pas zhus par @167b gyur te /
translated: Then the king, his mind amazed by the excellence of his mind, asked:

original: rgyal po chen po khyed la gang du smon lam yod ces bya ba brjod par 'os so //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po khyed la gang du smon lam yod ces bya ba brjod par 'os so //
translated: It is proper for you to say, Great King, where is your aspiration?

original: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
translated: The Bodhisattva said:

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub bdag / zhi ba'i phyir ni thob par 'dod //🔽srid gsum rgya mtshor nub gyur pa'i //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub bdag / zhi ba'i phyir ni thob par 'dod // srid gsum rgya mtshor nub gyur pa'i //
translated: I desire to attain unsurpassed enlightenment For the sake of peace,🔽And to rescue this world

original: 'jig rten 'di ni gdon phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di ni gdon phyir ro //
translated: Which is drowning in the ocean of the three existences.

original: dbyig pa can gyis smras pa /
analyzed: dbyig pa can gyis smras pa /
translated: Daṇḍa said:

original: gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub thob //
analyzed: gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub thob //
translated: When you attain enlightenment,

original: mi shes rab rib gcod pa ni //
analyzed: mi shes rab rib gcod pa ni //
translated: And remove the cataracts of ignorance,

original: de tshe khyod kyis sleb par bdag / gyur cig des ni so sor thos //
analyzed: de tshe khyod kyis sleb par bdag / gyur cig des ni so sor thos //
translated: May I be there, having heard it from you.

original: de nas bram ze de song nas gtam de de rnams la smras te /
analyzed: de nas bram ze de song nas gtam de de rnams la smras te /
translated: Then the brahmin went and told them the news.

original: gter de bton nas dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa gnyen 'dun rnams dang lhan cig tu nor gyis phongs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal te bde bar gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: gter de bton nas dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa gnyen 'dun rnams dang lhan cig tu nor gyis phongs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal te bde bar gnas par gyur to //
translated: Having extracted the treasure, with a joyful mind, he removed the suffering of poverty for his relatives and lived happily.

original: de nas blon po'i gtso bo la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' la yang nas yang du 'di ltar bstod pa'i skud par brgyus pa'i tshig gi me tog rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing gnas so //
analyzed: de nas blon po'i gtso bo la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' la yang nas yang du 'di ltar bstod pa'i skud par brgyus pa'i tshig gi me tog rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing gnas so //
translated: Then some chief minister, having repeatedly praised the Bodhisattva with these words strung together like flowers, remained there.

original: lha'i 'di lta bu shes pa che ba'i bdag nyid kyis su zhig ces bya ba ngo mtshar par bkug pa ma yin zhes smas te /
analyzed: lha'i 'di lta bu shes pa che ba'i bdag nyid kyis su zhig ces bya ba ngo mtshar par bkug pa ma yin zhes smas te /
translated: He said, By whose great knowledge is this known? as if to arouse wonder.

original: ril gnas pa'i me ni ring po nas kyang du ba'i rjes su dpag pas rjes dpog byed //
analyzed: ril gnas pa'i me ni ring po nas kyang du ba'i rjes su dpag pas rjes dpog byed //
translated: The fire that abides in wood is inferred from afar by the sign of smoke.

original: 'jig rten 'di na rjes su dpog byed dpag par bya ba'i yul can rjes dpog blo ni mthong //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di na rjes su dpog byed dpag par bya ba'i yul can rjes dpog blo ni mthong //
translated: In this world, inference is the cognition that has an inferred object.

original: rjes su dpag bya'i dngos po the tshom can la skye bo the tshom bskyed //
analyzed: rjes su dpag bya'i dngos po the tshom can la skye bo the tshom bskyed //
translated: When the thing to be inferred is doubtful, it produces doubt in people.

original: the tshom med pa'i blo ldan khyed 'dra rnams la dbang po las ni 'das kyang mngon sum ldan //
analyzed: the tshom med pa'i blo ldan khyed 'dra rnams la dbang po las ni 'das kyang mngon sum ldan //
translated: But for you wise ones who are free from doubt, even though you transcend the senses, you have direct perception.

original: gang phyir 'jig rten 'di na yid ni chung ba yul can dbang po rnams kyi dbang byas te //
